EmailTemplate.subject: Meetup in Palo Alto - Analytics & Data Science of Connected Transportation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.meetup.com/Pivotal-NY/events/228611231/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=gdb-meetup-q116]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=}},
We want to tell you about an interesting Meetup event happening at the Pivotal office in Palo Alto on June 21st starting at 6PM: The Analytics & Data Science Behind Connected Transportation <[[http://www.meetup.com/Data-Engineers-Guild/events/231421622/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=palo-alto-meetup-q216]]>. This event is being held by the Data Engineers Guild Meetup Group, <[[http://www.meetup.com/Data-Engineers-Guild/]]> and is sponsored by Pivotal and Uber.
Transportation is undergoing as big a revolution as when the automobile was invented. Thanks to the convergence of constantly connected devices, advanced analytics, and artificial intelligence, this change incorporates some of the latest technologies and data science methods. This area is a huge opportunity with more than 600 companies and $17B in funding <[[http://insights.venturescanner.com/2015/03/20/connected-car-market-update/]]>.
In this event, the Data Engineer’s Guild takes a look into the analytics technologies and data science techniques used in a couple of connected transportation applications.
Speakers from Pivotal and Uber will talk on the following topics:
- How Data Science Can Help Predict Vehicle Breakdowns and Improve Maintenance by Srivatsan Ramanujam & Esther Vasiete, Pivotal
- A Big Data and Analytics Platform for Predictive Maintenance in Connected Cars by Frank McQuillan, Pivotal
- Data Science in The Ride Sharing Economy by Ralph Rabbat, Uber
REGISTER NOW <[[http://www.meetup.com/Data-Engineers-Guild/events/231421622/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=palo-alto-meetup-q216]]>
About the Speakers:
- Srivatsan Ramanujan is a Principal Data Scientist at Pivotal where he executes Data Sciences labs for their customers, with a special focus on Text Analytics. - Esther Vasiete is a Data Scientist at Pivotal, where she has engaged on data science labs with customers from different sectors. - Frank McQuillan is Director of Product Management at Pivotal, focusing on analytics and machine learning for large data sets. - Ralph Rabbat is the head of Predictive Analytics at Uber where he leads Forecasting, Pricing, and Driver and Rider Incentives with a special focus on Machine Learning.
Can't join us in person? No need to RSVP—you can participate via LiveStream <[[http://livestream.com/pemo/datascienceconnectedtransportation?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=palo-alto-meetup-q216]]>.
